tool_description: Generates technical schematics and construction diagrams for textile patterns with precise measurements and assembly instructions.

garment_type.description: Type of item being designed (sweater, cardigan, hat, scarf, blanket, vest, shawl, mittens, socks)

construction_style.description: Construction method (top-down, bottom-up, seamed, seamless, modular)

include_seam_allowances.description: Whether to include seam allowances in measurements

design_elements.description: Special features to include in schematic

error_messages: Unsupported garment type: Use one of [sweater, cardigan, hat, scarf, blanket, vest, shawl, mittens, socks].
Invalid construction style: Use one of [top-down, bottom-up, seamed, seamless, modular].
Measurement array mismatch: key_measurements and measurement_labels must have the same length (3-15 items).
Invalid ease type: Use one of [close-fitting, standard, loose, oversized].
Measurement values invalid: All measurements must be positive numbers between 0.5 and 100 inches.
usage: Specify garment_type, construction_style, and arrays of measurements with labels. Optional parameters refine the schematic details and construction notes.

schematic_description.description: Detailed description of the technical schematic

piece_breakdown.description: List of individual pieces needed with dimensions

measurement_summary.description: Formatted summary of all key measurements
